meanings.definition: An interlaced structure or pattern resembling a lattice.
meanings.sent1: The garden trellis had a beautiful latticework design.
meanings.sent2: The window had latticework that allowed sunlight to filter through.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb the latticework fence but got stuck halfway.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts formed a latticework of memories, intertwining and connecting.
meanings.sent5: The intricate latticework of branches against the sky created a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: A framework consisting of crisscrossed strips or bars.
meanings.sent1: The bridge was supported by a sturdy latticework of steel beams.
meanings.sent2: The artist used latticework to create a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The chef skillfully arranged the pasta in a latticework pattern on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a latticework of lights against the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The latticework of shadows on the ground created a fascinating pattern.
